channel.title: Front-End Web Development on fewd
channel.description: Recent content in Front-End Web Development on fewd

item.title: Week 2 resources
item.description: Our focus this week will be on the Box Model and layout. Use the resources below to supplement in-class discussion. Notable resources The Box Model A great primer on how different display types behave with regard to the box model Class vs. ID CSS reset MDN documentation on floats

item.title: First Week resources
item.description: This week, you should check out these resources regarding HTML and CSS. Notable resources Marksheet.io Codepen.io Mozilla Developer Network PRACTICE spinning up new, simple projects so that the process becomes second nature.
